name: Postiz
description: Postiz is an open-source social media scheduling platform for planning and publishing content across multiple channels.

notes.text: No default credentials are created. Open the web UI and register your first account.
Main stack files are stored in `/opt/postiz`.
Temporal UI and Spotlight are disabled by default in `docker-compose.override.yaml` to avoid extra open ports. Remove their `profiles` entries to enable them.
